C D F G H I L M O R S _ 

M

MainActivity - Class in com.procom.filefly
The FragmentActivity responsible for handling the android.app.ActionBar and ViewPager user elements, handling selection of tabs corresponding to either of SendFragment or DocumentListFragment, and initializing write access to the /"SD Card"/FileFly/received/ directory tree.
MainActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter - Class in com.procom.filefly
A FragmentPagerAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the sections/tabs/pages.
mChooseFileButton - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.widget.Button corresponding to the "Choose File" button
mChosenFile - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ChooseFileDialogFragment
The filename (including extension) of the file the user selected
mDocumentListFragment - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.MainActivity
Instance of DocumentListFragment to be managed by the ViewPager
mFileList - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ChooseFileDialogFragment
The Array of filenames found in the FileFly directory on external storage
mFilenameTextView - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.widget.TextView containing the name of a file in the FileFly directory
mFileUriCallback - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The instance of SendFragment.FileUriCallback used to provide the callback to the Android Beam API aftering setting it as such with android.nfc.NfcAdapter#setBeamPushUrisCallback
mFileUris - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The Array of size 1 of android.net.Uris that is returned by the callback method, SendFragment.FileUriCallback.createBeamUris(NfcEvent), to the Android Beam API.
mFirstName - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ReceiveActivity
The parsed out sender's first name
mFNameEditText - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.widget.EditText containing the first name of the sender
mIntent - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ReceiveActivity
The incoming Intent with a android.content.Intent#ACTION_VIEW schema containing a android.net.Uri for the transferred file.
mLastName - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ReceiveActivity
The parsed out sender's last name
mListener - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ChooseFileDialogFragment
Instance of the abstract ChooseFileDialogFragment.ChooseFileDialogListener interface (which means it is an instance of a class that implements it.
mLNameEditText - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.widget.EditText containing the last name of the sender
mNfcAdapter - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.nfc.NfcAdapter that models the hardware NFC adapter
mOriginalFileName - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ReceiveActivity
The parsed out original filename that was selected by the user
mPath - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ChooseFileDialogFragment
The File representing the FileFly external storage directory
mPath - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.ReceiveActivity
A File representing the path to the transferred file
mSectionsPagerAdapter - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.MainActivity
The PagerAdapter that will provide fragments for each of the sections.
mSendButton - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.SendFragment
The android.widget.Button corresponding to the "Send" button
mSenderFragment - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.MainActivity
Instance of SendFragment to be managed by the ViewPager
mViewPager - Variable in class com.procom.filefly.MainActivity
The ViewPager that will host the section contents
